paper_abstract: The workshops day at the Sixth International Conference on Web logs and Social Media included three full-day workshops (Real-Time Analysis and Mining of Social Streams, Social Media Visualization, and When the City Meets the Citizen) and one half-day workshop (The Potential of Social Media Tools and Data for Journalists in the News Media Industry). Workshops were held on June 4, 2012, the day prior to the first day of the technical conference, in Dublin, Ireland.
paper_title: Reports on the Workshops Held at the Sixth International AAAI Conference on Weblogs and Social Media
